title: Odell Beckham's contract, Falcons Super Bowl prediction (Football 08/28)
description:
Will Brinson takes a look at the deal the Giants gave the Odell Beckham and whether they can win in 2018, the rumors surrounding Khalil Mack and the Raiders lack of contract talk, Tom Brady hanging up on a radio interview and more NFL news. He then explains why he's picking the Falcons to win the Super Bowl in 2018 and the strategy he's discovered for the first few rounds of a fantasy draft that might be the new way to operate.
